name: NonMutuallyExclusiveProps

members.name: prefix
members.description: Text to display before value

members.name: suffix
members.description: Text to display after value

members.name: verticalContent
members.description: Content to vertically display above the input value

members.name: placeholder
members.description: Hint text to display

members.name: value
members.description: Initial value for the input

members.name: helpText
members.description: Additional hint text to display

members.name: label
members.description: Label for the input

members.name: labelAction
members.description: Adds an action to the label

members.name: labelHidden
members.description: Visually hide the label

members.name: disabled
members.description: Disable the input

members.name: clearButton
members.description: Show a clear text button in the input

members.name: selectTextOnFocus
members.description: Indicates whether or not the entire value should be selected on focus.

members.name: suggestion
members.description: An inline autocomplete suggestion containing the input value. The characters that complete the input value are selected for ease of deletion on input change or keypress of Backspace/Delete. The selected substring is visually highlighted with subdued styling.

members.name: readOnly
members.description: Disable editing of the input

members.name: autoFocus
members.description: Automatically focus the input

members.name: focused
members.description: Force the focus state on the input

members.name: multiline
members.description: Allow for multiple lines of input

members.name: error
members.description: Error to display beneath the label

members.name: type
members.description: Determine type of input

members.name: name
members.description: Name of the input

members.name: id
members.description: ID for the input

members.name: role
members.description: Defines a specific role attribute for the input

members.name: step
members.description: Limit increment value for numeric and date-time inputs

members.name: largeStep
members.description: Increment value for numeric and date-time inputs when using Page Up or Page Down

members.name: autoComplete
members.description: Enable automatic completion by the browser. Set to "off" when you do not want the browser to fill in info

members.name: max
members.description: Mimics the behavior of the native HTML attribute, limiting the maximum value

members.name: maxLength
members.description: Maximum character length for an input

members.name: maxHeight
members.description: Maximum height of the input element. Only applies when `multiline` is `true`

members.name: min
members.description: Mimics the behavior of the native HTML attribute, limiting the minimum value

members.name: minLength
members.description: Minimum character length for an input

members.name: pattern
members.description: A regular expression to check the value against

members.name: inputMode
members.description: Choose the keyboard that should be used on mobile devices

members.name: spellCheck
members.description: Indicate whether value should have spelling checked

members.name: ariaOwns
members.description: Indicates the id of a component owned by the input

members.name: ariaExpanded
members.description: Indicates whether or not a Popover is displayed

members.name: ariaControls
members.description: Indicates the id of a component controlled by the input

members.name: ariaActiveDescendant
members.description: Indicates the id of a related component’s visually focused element to the input

members.name: ariaAutocomplete
members.description: Indicates what kind of user input completion suggestions are provided

members.name: showCharacterCount
members.description: Indicates whether or not the character count should be displayed

members.name: align
members.description: Determines the alignment of the text in the input

members.name: requiredIndicator
members.description: Visual required indicator, adds an asterisk to label

members.name: monospaced
members.description: Indicates whether or not a monospaced font should be used

members.name: variant
members.description: Visual styling options for the TextField

members.name: size
members.description: Changes the size of the input, giving it more or less padding

members.name: tone
members.description: Indicates the tone of the text field

members.name: autoSize
members.description: Whether the TextField will grow as the text within the input changes

members.name: loading
members.description: Indicates the loading state
